title: Nossa Senhora da Glória (Chapel of)
body: Henrique de Bettencourt founded this chapel in 1599 in the parish of Campanário. In 1823, its administrator was the morgado Luís Correia. It was restored a few years ago by the Countess of Torre Bela, who owns it (1921).

Campanário: Location where the Chapel of Nossa Senhora da Glória was founded by Henrique de Bettencourt

Henrique de Bettencourt: Founder of the Chapel of Nossa Senhora da Glória

1599: Year of the foundation of the Chapel of Nossa Senhora da Glória
1823: Year when Luís Correia was the administrator of the chapel
